title: East Godavari District Court Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Head Clerk Post
description: East Godavari District Court has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Head Clerk Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the East Godavari District Court Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection Process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. If you ...
